Package exceptions

package exceptions
Custom exception types used across the assignment.

This package contains small, focused exception classes that model error conditions specific to the data structures and parser:

  • EmptyQueueException — thrown when queue operations are attempted on an empty queue.
  • StackUnderflowException — thrown when stack operations are attempted on an empty stack (or otherwise invalid stack operations).

Using specific exception classes (rather than only runtime exceptions) helps tests and calling code precisely detect and handle expected error situations.

Since:
2025
Author:
Alexander Raagas, Minh Tam, Mrinal Jha, Noah Zschogner
  • Exception Classes
    Class
    Description
    EmptyQueueException
    Exception thrown to indicate that an operation requiring one or more elements in the queue was attempted on an empty queue.
    StackUnderflowException
    Exception thrown when an operation is attempted on an empty stack.
